cleaned_text: and Holistic Health | MedStar Health Improving patient outcomes by treating the whole person Integrative medicine combines traditional medicine with approaches from other healing traditions. Our program at MedStar Health provides important complementary therapies to help patients achieve optimal healing. Our inclusive approach has proven to be beneficial in treating individuals with a wide range of conditions, from cancer to women's health issues. (See conditions below.) Practitioners take into account not only physical symptoms, but also the psychological, social, and spiritual impact the condition may have on a person. Integrative medicine practitioners work hand-in-hand with other specialists at MedStar Health to develop treatment plans that incorporate both traditional and holistic therapies.
